[
    EchoOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Literal(
            String(
                LiteralString {
                    value: "<?php\n",
                    span: Span(
                        1,
                        5,
                    ),
                },
            ),
        ),
        ending: CloseTag(
            Span(
                1,
                15,
            ),
        ),
    },
    InlineHtml(
        "\nsome html\n",
    ),
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            3,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    If(
        IfStatement {
            if: Span(
                4,
                5,
            ),
            condition: Parenthesized {
                left_parenthesis: Span(
                    4,
                    8,
                ),
                inner: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                4,
                                9,
                            ),
                            name: "$d",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                right_parenthesis: Span(
                    4,
                    11,
                ),
            },
            body: Statement {
                statement: Block(
                    Braced {
                        left_brace: Span(
                            4,
                            13,
                        ),
                        inner: [
                            Echo {
                                echo: Span(
                                    5,
                                    9,
                                ),
                                values: [
                                    Literal(
                                        String(
                                            LiteralString {
                                                value: "// ",
                                                span: Span(
                                                    5,
                                                    14,
                                                ),
                                            },
                                        ),
                                    ),
                                ],
                                ending: Semicolon(
                                    Span(
                                        5,
                                        19,
                                    ),
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                        right_brace: Span(
                            6,
                            5,
                        ),
                    },
                ),
                elseifs: [],
                else: None,
            },
        },
    ),
    ClosingTag(
        Span(
            7,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    InlineHtml(
        "\n",
    ),
]
